content:
Sure, here is some sample website content that mentions Horizon Homes' free local move offer, including specific information on the dollar amount offered for listings and buyers, a mention of the superior realtor service that comes with it, the way credit can be used towards junk removal and why they are the best in the quad cities:

"At Horizon Homes, we understand that moving can be a stressful and overwhelming experience. That's why we're committed to making your move as easy and stress-free as possible. One way we do this is by offering a free local move to our clients, up to $2,500 for sellers and $1,500 for buyers. And that's not all, our superior realtor service will help you navigate through the process of buying or selling your home, whether it be pricing, negotiating, or paperwork. And you can use any remaining credit towards our additional services such as junk removal.

Our professional moving team will handle all aspects of your move, including packing, loading, and transport. And the best part? There's no out of pocket expense for you, as long as you are using us as a realtor for your sale or purchase. So, you can relax and let us take care of the heavy lifting.

In addition to our free local move and realtor service, we also offer a range of other services to make your move even easier. These services include professional packing, climate-controlled storage, and junk removal. So, whether you're moving down the street or across the state, we have everything you need to make your move a success. We pride ourselves in being the best moving company in the Quad Cities with a reputation of providing great service, which is a big plus for those who are looking for a reliable and trustworthy real estate and moving company.

Contact us today to learn more about our free local move offer and how we can help make your next move a breeze."

Please note, again, this is just a sample text that you can use as a reference and need to review, modify and double check if the numbers, services, and conditions are the same, also if Horizon Homes is indeed the best in the area and if their reputation is as strong as mentioned.
